data.message:
I don't like to rap about non-sense things. Rap about money, sex, drugs? No point at all, So I've decided to rap about my life, experiences, how I see the world, and the truth around me.!! So would you give me a chance by listening to my songs via youtube, and subscribe so I have a loyal following on youtube. If you dont have a youtube account comment so I can give you my facebook page. THanks in advance, for giving me this shot!!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfAal-GK5vv3TUD8yWqkeMA/videos
